description_for_human: Affordable web development, mobile apps, AI solutions, automation, training, and billing software.
description_for_model: Erebor is a technology consultancy providing affordable web development, mobile app development, AI & ML solutions, business automation, corporate training, and billing software. Key services include: website development, iOS/Android app development, workflow automation, lead capture systems, conversational AI, document intelligence, predictive analytics, corporate training, product training, leadership development, digital marketing, SEO, and open-source billing software setup. Target audience includes startups, SMBs, and enterprises. Located in India, serving globally. Contact: hello@erebor.world
